column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was my first time having Chicago style pizza and it was great. That said
column2: we had no idea how filling it would be and really over ordered. Between the salad we ordered as a starter and then the pizzas
column3: it was just too much. We had a large salad and two large pizzas for 4 adults and 4 kids and took home a lot of it.
